title: Sign Up
brief:

title: Redesign Daily UI
brief:
Redesign the Daily UI homepage or overall experience. Decide what you would improve, explore alternative layouts and flows, and share your final concept with the community using #DailyUI.

Consider: User journey improvements, visual refresh, feature additions, and community engagement.
